member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.Size
member.summary:
Gets or sets the size of the visual.
It can be either relative (percentage of the parent) or absolute (in world units).
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.Position
member.summary:
Gets or sets the offset of the visual.
It can be either relative (percentage of the parent) or absolute (in world units).
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.RelativeSize
member.summary:
Gets or sets the relative size of the visual
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control).
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.RelativePosition
member.summary:
Gets or sets the relative offset of the visual
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control).
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.PositionPolicy
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the x and y offset values are relative
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, both the x and the y offset are relative.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.PositionPolicyX
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the x offset values are relative
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, the x offset is relative.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.PositionPolicyY
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the y offset values are relative
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, the y offset is relative.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.SizePolicy
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether the size values of the width or the height are relative
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, offsets of both the width and the height are relative to the control's size.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.SizePolicyWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether size values of the width are relative.
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, the value of the width is relative to the control's width.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.SizePolicyHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether size values of the height are relative
(percentage [0.0f to 1.0f] of the control) or absolute (in world units).
By default, the height value is relative to the control's height.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.VisualMap.Origin
member.summary:

Optional.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.URL
member.summary:
Gets or sets the URL of the image.
Mandatory.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.AlphaMaskURL
member.summary:
Gets or sets the URL of the alpha mask.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.AuxiliaryImageURL
member.summary: Overlays the auxiliary iamge on top of an NPatch image. The resulting visual image will be at least as large as the smallest possible n-patch or the auxiliary image, whichever is larger.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.FittingMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets fitting options used when resizing images to fit the desired dimensions.
If not supplied, the default is FittingModeType.ShrinkToFit.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.SamplingMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets filtering options used when resizing images to the sample original pixels.
If not supplied, the default is SamplingModeType.Box.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.DesiredWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets the desired image width.
If not specified, the actual image width is used.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.DesiredHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the desired image height.
If not specified, the actual image height is used.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.SynchronousLoading
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to load the image synchronously.
If not specified, the default is false, i.e., the image is loaded asynchronously.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.BorderOnly
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to draw the borders only (If true).
If not specified, the default is false.
For n-patch images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.PixelArea
member.summary:
Gets or sets the image area to be displayed.
It is a rectangular area.
The first two elements indicate the top-left position of the area, and the last two elements are the areas of the width and the height respectively.
If not specified, the default value is Vector4 (0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0), i.e., the entire area of the image.
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.WrapModeU
member.summary:
Gets or sets the wrap mode for the u coordinate.
It decides how the texture should be sampled when the u coordinate exceeds the range of 0.0 to 1.0.
If not specified, the default is WrapModeType.Default(CLAMP).
For normal quad images only.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.WrapModeV
member.summary:
Gets or sets the wrap mode for the v coordinate.
It decides how the texture should be sampled when the v coordinate exceeds the range of 0.0 to 1.0.
The first two elements indicate the top-left position of the area, and the last two elements are the areas of the width and the height respectively.
If not specified, the default is WrapModeType.Default(CLAMP).
For normal quad images only. Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.MaskContentScale
member.summary: Gets or sets scale factor to apply to the content image before masking.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.CropToMask
member.summary: Whether to crop image to mask or scale mask to fit image.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.AuxiliaryImageAlpha
member.summary: An alpha value for mixing between the masked main NPatch image and the auxiliary image.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.ReleasePolicy
member.summary:
Get or set the Image Visual release policy
It decides if a texture should be released from the cache or kept to reduce loading time

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.LoadPolicy
member.summary:
Get or set the Image Visual image loading policy
It decides if a texture should be loaded immediately after source set or only after visual is added to window

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.ImageVisual.OrientationCorrection
member.summary:
Get or set whether to automatically correct the orientation based on exif data.
If not specified, the default is true.
For JPEG images only.
Optional.

member.summary: Compose the out visual map.

member.summary:

member.summary:
Gets or sets the location of the ".mtl" file.
If not specified, then a textureless object is assumed.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.TexturesPath
member.summary:
Gets or sets the path to the directory the textures (including gloss and normal) are stored in.
Mandatory if using material.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.ShadingMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the type of shading mode that the mesh will use.
If anything the specified shading mode requires is missing, a simpler mode that can be handled with what has been supplied will be used instead.
If not specified, it will use the best it can support (will try MeshVisualShadingModeValue.TexturedWithDetailedSpecularLighting first).
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.UseMipmapping
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to use mipmaps for textures or not.
If not specified, the default is true.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.UseSoftNormals
member.summary:
Gets or sets whether to average normals at each point to smooth textures or not.
If not specified, the default is true.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.LightPosition
member.summary:
Gets or sets the position, in the stage space, of the point light that applies lighting to the model.
This is based off the stage's dimensions, so using the width and the height of the stage halved will correspond to the center, and using all zeroes will place the light at the top-left corner.
If not specified, the default is an offset outwards from the center of the screen.
Optional.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.MeshVisual.ComposingPropertyMap
member.summary: Compose the out visual map.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual
member.summary: A class encapsulating the property map of the primetive visual.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.Shape
member.summary:
Gets or sets the specific shape to render.
If not specified, the default is PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Sphere.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.MixColor
member.summary:
Gets or sets the color of the shape.
If not specified, the default is Color (0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1.0).
Applies to all shapes.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.Slices
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of slices as you go around the shape.
For spheres and conical frustrums, this determines how many divisions there are as you go around the object.
If not specified, the default is 128.
The range is from 1 to 255.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.Stacks
member.summary:
Gets or sets the number of stacks as you go down the shape.
For spheres, 'stacks' determines how many layers there are as you go down the object.
If not specified, the default is 128.
The range is from 1 to 255.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ScaleTopRadius
member.summary:
Gets or sets the scale of the radius of the top circle of a conical frustrum.
If not specified, the default is 1.0f.
Applies to: - PrimitiveVisualShapeType.ConicalFrustrum
Only values greater than or equal to 0.0f are accepted.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ScaleBottomRadius
member.summary:
Gets or sets the scale of the radius of the bottom circle of a conical frustrum.
If not specified, the default is 1.5f.
Applies to: - PrimitiveVisualShapeType.ConicalFrustrum
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Cone
Only values greater than or equal to 0.0f are accepted.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ScaleHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the scale of the height of a conic.
If not specified, the default is 3.0f.
Applies to:
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.ConicalFrustrum
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Cone
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Cylinder
Only values greater than or equal to 0.0f are accepted.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ScaleRadius
member.summary:
Gets or sets the scale of the radius of a cylinder.
If not specified, the default is 1.0f.
Applies to:
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Cylinder
Only values greater than or equal to 0.0f are accepted.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ScaleDimensions
member.summary:
Gets or sets the dimensions of a cuboid. Scales in the same fashion as a 9-patch image.
If not specified, the default is Vector3.One.
Applies to:
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Cube
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.Octahedron
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.BevelledCube
Each Vector3 parameter should be greater than or equal to 0.0f.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.BevelPercentage
member.summary:
Gets or sets determines how bevelled the cuboid should be, based off the smallest dimension.
Bevel percentage ranges from 0.0 to 1.0. It affects the ratio of the outer face widths to the width of the overall cube.
If not specified, the default is 0.0f (no bevel).
Applies to:
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.BevelledCube
The range is from 0.0f to 1.0f.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.BevelSmoothness
member.summary:
Gets or sets descriptions of how smooth the bevelled edges should be.
If not specified, the default is 0.0f (sharp edges).
Applies to:
- PrimitiveVisualShapeType.BevelledCube
The range is from 0.0f to 1.0f.
Optional.

member.name: P:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.LightPosition
member.summary:
Gets or sets the position, in the stage space, of the point light that applies lighting to the model.
This is based off the stage's dimensions, so using the width and the height of the stage halved will correspond to the center, and using all zeroes will place the light at the top-left corner.
If not specified, the default is an offset outwards from the center of the screen.
Applies to all shapes.
Optional.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.PrimitiveVisual.ComposingPropertyMap
member.summary: Compose the out visual map.

member.name: T:Tizen.NUI.Wheel
member.summary:
The wheel event structure is used to store a wheel rolling, it facilitates processing of the wheel rolling and passing to other libraries like Toolkit.
There is a key modifier which relates to keys like Alt, Shift, and Ctrl functions are supplied to check if they have been pressed when the wheel is being rolled.
We support a mouse device and there may be another custom device that support the wheel event. The device type is specified as \e type.
The mouse wheel event can be sent to the specific actor but the custom wheel event will be sent to the window.

The time the wheel is being rolled.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.SetOpaqueState(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Sets a transparent window's visual state to opaque.
If a visual state of a transparent window is opaque,
then the window manager could handle it as an opaque window when calculating visibility.
member.param: Whether the window's visual state is opaque.
member.remarks:
This will have no effect on an opaque window.
It doesn't change transparent window to opaque window but lets the window manager know the visual state of the window.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.IsOpaqueState
member.summary: Returns whether a transparent window's visual state is opaque or not.
member.returns: True if the window's visual state is opaque, false otherwise.
member.remarks: The return value has no meaning on an opaque window.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.GrabKeyTopmost(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Grabs the key specified by a key for a window only when a window is the topmost window.
This function can be used for following example scenarios:
- Mobile - Using volume up or down as zoom up or down in camera apps.
member.returns: True if the grab succeeds.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.UngrabKeyTopmost(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Ungrabs the key specified by a key for the window.
Note: If this function is called between key down and up events of a grabbed key, an application doesn't receive the key up event.
member.returns: True if the ungrab succeeds.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.GrabKey(System.Int32,Tizen.NUI.Window.KeyGrabMode)
member.summary:
Grabs the key specified by a key for a window in a GrabMode.
Details: This function can be used for following example scenarios:
- TV - A user might want to change the volume or channel of the background TV contents while focusing on the foregrund app.
- Mobile - When a user presses the Home key, the homescreen appears regardless of the current foreground app.
- Mobile - Using the volume up or down as zoom up or down in camera apps.
member.param: The grab mode for the key.
member.returns: True if the grab succeeds.

member.name: M:Tizen.NUI.Window.UngrabKey(System.Int32)
member.summary:
Ungrabs the key specified by a key for a window.
Note: If this function is called between key down and up events of a grabbed key, an application doesn't receive the key up event.
member.returns: True if the ungrab succeeds.
